thread.section_title: Backcountry Gear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Backcountry Gear | backcountrygear.com | 3 of 113
thread.title: Brandon

author: Brandon
title: Brandon
text: I had been looking at some Fimbulvetr snowshoes and found the best price here. Free shipping, and super fast shipping! Normally free shipping takes forever, but this felt like I paid for expedited shipping. Easy to use website, great selection, easy checkout, good communication and updated via email about where my order was in process. I'll definitely be returning for more gear!!
